incubator-brooklyn_0ba865f.message:
Cleanup AbstractGeoDnsService.addTargetHost

- avoid NPE when hostname==null and ip!=null, and !USE_HOSTNAMES
- improve logging, so if log about hostname missing and then subsequent
  can't infer geo, then still log about the latter.
- general code cleanup; but more could be done.

Merge pull request #120 from pveentjer/fix-networkutils

networkutils fix; npe on when a port is null

incubator-brooklyn_1bc16cf.message: don't cause NPE inside location list coercions (alt fix for recent fix for NPE from where this is invoked in MachineLifecycleTasks), and some notes on jclouds location for softlayer

incubator-brooklyn_2227415.message: Jclouds openIptables: avoid NPE if no inboundPorts

incubator-brooklyn_2915b77.message:
JcloudsLocation: avoid NPE on user-creation

If jclouds node doesn’t know its operatingSystem, then was
getting NPE. Guard against that, and default to unix.

incubator-brooklyn_2d11d2b.message:
Avoid NPE in REST api deserialisation

- motivated by NPE in TaskSummary<init> for tags

incubator-brooklyn_3203ac2.message:
Merge pull request #951 from aledsage/fix/NPE-EntityDynamicType-constructor-calling-entity.toString

Fix NPE when EntityDynamicType constructor calling entity.toString

file.patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,26 @@
+name: chef-mysql-sample
+services:
+- type: chef:mysql
+  
+  cookbook_urls:
+    # the standard cookbooks should be packaged as tarballs, unless you have knife installed
+    mysql: file:///tmp/brooklyn-chef/cookbooks/mysql.tgz
+    openssl: file:///tmp/brooklyn-chef/cookbooks/openssl.tgz
+    
+  launch_attributes:
+    mysql:
+      # these attrs are required by the mysql cookbook under node['mysql']
+      # (many others are supported and can also be passed here)
+      server_debian_password: p4ssw0rd
+      server_root_password: p4ssw0rd
+      server_repl_password: p4ssw0rd
+      
+  # how to determine if the process is running and how to kill it
+  # (supported options are `service_name` and `pid_file`; typically pick one)
+  service_name: mysqld
+  #pid_file: /var/run/mysqld/mysqld.pid
+
+location:
+  byon:
+    hosts: 192.168.33.12
+    user: vagrant

incubator-brooklyn_41a8a09.message:
many minor usability enhancements for chef, as shown by new simple example mysql-chef.yaml

- catch occasional NPE
- don't use ruby `absolute_path` as it is not in some common (older) versions
- better messages on errors
- respond to more flags in simple yaml
- install recipes from local machine (using classpath or file:/// URL's)
- misc tweaks to deploy/archive/install (cc @grkvlt) to run as tasks for traceability

incubator-brooklyn_468d788.message: create specs from catalog items, and use these in many places.  also fix some NPE and serialization issues.

incubator-brooklyn_4d85f30.message: networkutils fix; npe on when a port is null

incubator-brooklyn_52e041b.message: Review changes for #810 including fix for NPE and adding new reverse lookup attributes

incubator-brooklyn_5feb638.message:
Merge pull request #920 from aledsage/fix/BrooklynLauncher-supplying-ManagementContext

Fix NPE when BrooklynLauncher given ManagementContext

incubator-brooklyn_638809c.message: JcloudsLocation: avoid NPE if node.getImageId null

incubator-brooklyn_6b4b9e5.message: avoid NPE on rebind when locations have been unmanaged

incubator-brooklyn_6d9e280.message:
Supports periodic persist for RebindManager

- Avoids hammering the CPU too much, by continually serializing
  mementos and persisting them.
- Fixes NPE in AbstractEntity.invalidate
- Fixes location rebind, where was overwriting all fields
  with their default values!
- In EntityManagementSupport, sets currentlyDeployed before
  calling onManagementStarting.
- ScheduledTask: make it useable from java
- Fixes SoftwareProcessEntity rebind (so provisioningLocation is
  restored, and stop can subsequently release the machine)

incubator-brooklyn_79b2cac.message:
Fix Entities.waitForServiceUp to avoid NPE

- Never return null for repeater’s `until`; always return TRUE or FALSE.
  Otherwise it will NPE.

incubator-brooklyn_8039a82.message:
Fix SshMachineLocation NPE

- sshPoolCache initialisation was moved to init() previously
  But for things that instantiate SshMachineLocation directly then
  the framework won't have called init.

incubator-brooklyn_80c40c5.message:
Disable HA when running from BrooklynRestApiLauncher

Otherwise HighAvailabilityManagerImpl throws NPE when creating
management record

incubator-brooklyn_8428219.message:
Fix NPE when BrooklynLauncher given ManagementContext

- caused by brooklynProperties being null

incubator-brooklyn_892823d.message: Fix NPE when jclouds image does not have OsFamily

incubator-brooklyn_8990528.message:
Merge pull request #389 from ahgittin/master

fix NPE bug where we assume jclouds images are named

incubator-brooklyn_8ced88b.message:
Deletes keys defined in ConfigKeys

- Update all uses to the new BrooklynConfigKeys
- Was previously deprecated, with fields in ConfigKeys referencing
  those in BrooklynConfigKeys. But this led to strange NPEs where
  ConfigKeys fields were null (presumably due to ordering of
  initialising the two classes' fields)!
- Breaks backwards compatibility, but better to have a compilation error
  than a weird NPE.

incubator-brooklyn_a08c72d.message:
minor geo-lookup fixes

occasional NPE in utrace lookup, deprecate geobytes lookup whose api has changed, better messages in integration test

incubator-brooklyn_a46bf80.message: jsonya now no-op if put(null), previously threw NPE

file.patch:
@@ -1,15 +1,19 @@
 package brooklyn.entity.messaging.rabbit;
 
+import static java.lang.String.format;
 import static brooklyn.entity.basic.lifecycle.CommonCommands.*
 
 import org.slf4j.Logger
 import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory
 
 import brooklyn.entity.basic.AbstractSoftwareProcessSshDriver
+import brooklyn.entity.basic.lifecycle.CommonCommands
 import brooklyn.entity.messaging.amqp.AmqpServer
 import brooklyn.location.basic.SshMachineLocation
 import brooklyn.util.NetworkUtils
 
+import com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList
+
 /**
  * TODO javadoc
  */
@@ -35,7 +39,7 @@ public class RabbitSshDriver extends AbstractSoftwareProcessSshDriver implements
         String url = "http://www.rabbitmq.com/releases/rabbitmq-server/v${version}/rabbitmq-server-generic-unix-${version}.tar.gz";
         String saveAs = "rabbitmq-server-generic-unix-${version}.tar.gz";
 
-        List<String> commands = ImmutableList.builder()
+        List<String> commands = ImmutableList.<String>builder()
                 .add(installPackage("erlang", // NOTE only 'port' states the version of Erlang used, maybe remove this constraint?
                         apt:"erlang-nox erlang-dev",
                         port:"erlang@${erlangVersion}+ssl"))

incubator-brooklyn_a88e2d2.message:
Fix integration tests

- NginxUrlMapping: test webapp changed, so writes out original url rather
  than url-mapping id
- Fix ElasticJavaWebAppServiceIntegrationTest
- Avoid NPE in ReflectionScanner if class can't be found
- fix RabbitSshDriver imports

incubator-brooklyn_ac87e04.message:
HA manager: loadManagementPlaneSyncRecord avoid NPE if persister null

- return an empty ManagementPlaneSyncRecordImpl

incubator-brooklyn_b2c549a.message:
avoid NPE in AbstractLocation if creationTimeUtc null

- happens if you unmanaged and then remanage an entity.
- the old creationTimeUtc will have been deleted from storage so will
  be null, so doing `long l = createTimeUtc.get()` NPEs

incubator-brooklyn_c2faca4.message:
Merge pull request #1474 from ahgittin/couchbase

Couchbase code tidy, nicer way to define sensors, and prevent NPE's, using new `Functionals`

incubator-brooklyn_c7a7c9d.message: don't throw NPE when named location refers to another (causing locations in catalog to fail), and extend unit test to trap this error

incubator-brooklyn_c7e20ce.message:
strings.join does not throw NPE

useful when using the joiner enricher if the inputted list is null

incubator-brooklyn_cda838a.message:
JmxSupport: improve NPE message when jmxPort null

Was previously throwing NPE converting the null attribute value to
an `int`.

incubator-brooklyn_d3a19f2.message:
JcloudsLocation: support unsetting config

- if set null loginUser, loginUserPassword, etc then don't pass it
  through to jclouds (i.e. don't NPE)

file.patch:
@@ -70,7 +70,7 @@ public void connectSensors() {
                     .pollAttribute(new JmxAttributePollConfig<String>(CONNECTOR_STATUS)
                             .objectName(connectorMbeanName)
                             .attributeName("stateName"))
-                    .pollAttribute(new JmxAttributePollConfig<Boolean>(SERVICE_UP)
+                    .pollAttribute(new JmxAttributePollConfig<Boolean>(SERVICE_PROCESS_IS_RUNNING)
                             .objectName(connectorMbeanName)
                             .attributeName("stateName")
                             .onSuccess(Functions.forPredicate(Predicates.<Object>equalTo("STARTED")))
